item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! My name is Shravan Doda. I’m a 21 year old student pursuing my undergraduate degree in Computer Science from BITS Pilani, Goa Campus. I love to code. I have a great interest in application development and system programming. I’m an avid open-source supporter. I like working on web technologies and operating systems. These days I’m working with Hydra Ecosystem where we are developing web tools based on linked data and semantic web.
